name: FDefaultContextSetting
doc: Represents a single input mapping context and the priority that it should be applied with

InputMappingContext: Input Mapping Context that should be Added to the EnhancedInputEditorSubsystem when it starts listening for input
Priority: The prioirty that should be given to this mapping context when it is added
bAddImmediately: If true, then this IMC will be applied immediately when the EI subsystem is ready
bRegisterWithUserSettings: If true, then this IMC will be registered with the User Input Settings (if one is available) immediately when the Enhanced Input subsystem starts.
